login-signup-modal-desc: You must log in or sign up first!
index-xbarat-desc: A secure platform to connect users directly to each other. Experience transfers and financial exchanges without intermediaries and fast with us.
index-how-it-works-title: Transfer your money with low fees - without moving the money between countries
index-how-it-works-desc: Xbarat is a platform for you to meet other users; With the help of this platform, you can trade with authenticated users and send your money anywhere in the world.
index-features-desc: We offer variant features and options to help you with your process of transferring your money
index-features-security-desc: One of the most obvious features of the Xbarat site is the high level of security and protection of users' identity documents. Using the most professional site security expert team and using the most up-to-date security tools, XBarat tries to provide a secure platform for the authentication of its users.
index-features-easy-transfer-desc: Xbarat has solved your concern for visiting in person and standing in long queues at exchange offices and banks. You can do your financial transactions easily and without wasting time from your home or office.
index-features-high-transaction-speed-de: Unlike the slow performance of exchanges, in Xbarat transactions and financial transfers of users are done online and due to fast response and high support, transactions will be done within two hours (during office hours) after sending the request.
index-features-low-fees-desc: By receiving only one percent of the fee from the total amount, which is much lower than the fees charged by banks and exchanges, X-Barat takes steps in order to benefit users from transactions as much as possible.
index-features-freedom-of-rate-title: Freedom Of Action Of Users In Choosing The Rate
index-features-freedom-of-rate-desc: One of the most common problems of users in transactions and financial exchanges is the single rate of exchange offices and banks. X-Barat has provided a platform to choose the desired rate in transactions, and users have more freedom of action in transactions.
index-features-support-languages-desc: On the Xbarat site, users can choose their preferred language. This feature will make it easier for users to communicate with the site. To choose the desired language, after entering the site, enter the main page and select the desired language from the header section.
index-social-media-desc-1-desc: You can visit the direct page at any hour of the day and ask your questions. Admins will answer your questions as soon as possible.
index-social-media-desc-2-desc: On the Xbarat Instagram page, complete and practical training posts about how to register, transfer and withdraw currency and etc, have been uploaded. which will familiarize you with how to work with the site.
index-social-media-desc-3-desc: All news related to Xbarat, such as closures, adding new currency, updating rates and etc, will be communicated to users and dear customers through the Instagram page.
index-journey-title: The journey of transfering your money
index-journey-desc-1: We transfer your money in 4 steps
index-journey-desc-2: Signup & Complete Profile - Deposit - Exchange - Withdraw or Transfer
index-journey-step-1-desc: Enter the system through the login button, select the registration option and enter your email. Create a personal password and after repeating it in the next field, agree to the terms of Xbarat. The confirmation code will be sent to the email you registered on the site. After entering the code in the relevant field and confirming, your account will be created and you will be transferred to the Xbarat main page. On the main page, go to the profile section and enter your details.
index-journey-step-2-desc: Enter the wallet section (bar on the left side of the site) and select your desired currency (the currency you want to convert), enter the currency amount, after selecting the send option, wait for the admin's approval. After admin approval, depending on your chosen currency (Riyal, Dollar, Euro, etc.), Shaba number, card number or PayPal address will be displayed in the wallet top-up request section. Make the deposit and upload the deposit slip in the same section of the request. After admin approval, your wallet will be charged.
index-journey-step-3-desc: Enter the main page of the site, click on the desired currency pair (example: Rial to Euro) in the Watch List section, enter the amount and rate you offer and select the send option. Wait for the admin's approval to convert your currency.
index-journey-step-4-desc: Note that only users who have an authenticated user account on the Xbarat site are able to transfer currency. In the wallet section, click on the desired currency and select the transfer option. In the first field, select the amount of currency and in the second field, enter the user code of the recipient of the currency (person or account to which you want to transfer). After selecting the send option and admin confirmation, the currency will be transferred. Go to your wallet and click on the desired currency, select the withdrawal option and enter the withdrawal amount, in the Bank Account field, enter the Shaba number, card number or PayPal address of the destination and send the option. Choose. Wait for the admin to upload the deposit slip in the withdrawal request section.
index-support-map-desc: Anywhere in the world, We provide services.
index-footer-trust-desc: One of the most obvious reasons for users trust in us is direct user-to-user connection and not having a money pool. Xbarat's role during transactions is to connect users to each other, validate users, guarantee transactions, and review and confirm transfer procedures.
privacyLanding: Welcome to Xbarat.We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your data.
tipsAgreement: I Have Accepted The Terms Above Hence XBarat Will Not Be Resposible For Further Mistakes.

drop.head: Validate Transaction
drop.value: Transaction Verification is required to guarantee that our users will have a secure platform to exchange,transfer,withdraw or deposit money and since We Do not have a money pool and all transactions are done by connecting users together we have to verify all transactions between every two users.

drop.head: Support
drop.value: We At Xbarat Feel The Need To Provide The Best Service To Our Users And Since We Have Users WorldWide, Gathering Information Helps us Offer The Quickest And Best Customer Support.Which We Do By Connecting People To Our Representers That are Stationed Nearby And Also Connect Them Based On Their Needs.

drop.head: Validate Identity
drop.value: Identity verification is required to guarantee and keep your transactions safe. With the help of validation companies in Iran and Europe, Xbarat guarantees its users and improves the transaction process. In Xbarat, the identity documents of you and other users are used only to verify and ensure the correctness of the transaction process; With this action, the possibility of any error and misuse of your property will be zero.

drop.head: Personal Data
drop.value: We Collect Your Personal Data When You Sign up In Xbarat Througn Places That You Can Control What Information You Give Us So That No Data Is Collected Without Consent. It is also the user's responsibility to protect this information.

drop.head: Transaction Receipts
drop.value: Each Transaction Between Every Two Users Transfers Through Our Transaction Verification Team Which They Examine Every Detail Of Every Transaction That Is Provided By The Users Making Them.

drop.head: Contact Info
drop.value: We Collect Your Phone Number,Email Address and Your City/Country

drop.head: Identity Info
drop.value: As Said Earlier We Have To Verify Identities;To Do So We Collect An Identification Record Such as a Passport Picture or An ID Card Picture

drop.head: Banking Information
drop.value: We Are In a Money Exchange Bussiness.This Makes Us Collect Information Regarding The Banks That The Deposits Should Go To,or Where Will Our Users Deposit Their Money From

context: 2- Select the desired currency (the currency you want to convert).
3- Enter the amount of the deposit.
4- Click the "Submit" button and wait for admin approval.
5- After admin approval, depending on the selected currency, the IBAN, card number, or PayPal address will be displayed in the "Request" section.

Accepted.full: Your request has been approved, and your wallet has been credited. The currency amount is visible in the "Balance" section of your wallet.

Rejected.full: Your request has been rejected. The reason has been reported in the "Request Box".

Upload Photo.desc: At this stage, you need to submit evidence of your completed deposit process
Upload Photo.full: You must submit a photo of the receipt showing the amount deposited, including the sender, recipient, and predetermined amount.

context: If you want to exchange your money, you can follow the steps of the exchange process here:
3- Enter the amount of money you want to exchange.
4- Choose the exchange rate from the rates table or enter your proposed rate.

Accepted.full: The money exchange request was successfully completed. You can view your balance in the source and destination cards.

Rejected.full: Your exchange request was likely rejected due to an error during the money transfer process.

context: 2- Select the withdrawal option (from the field of the currency you wish to withdraw).
4- Select your desired account (this can include a card number, IBAN, or PayPal address).
5- Click the "Submit" button and wait for the admin to upload the payment receipt in the withdrawal request section.

Accepted.full: Your request has been approved. Wait for the admin to upload the payment receipt in the request section.

Rejected.full: Your withdrawal request has been rejected. The reason has been reported in the "Request Box."

context: If you want to transfer your money, you can follow the steps of the transfer process here:
2- Select the card from which you want to transfer currency.
5- Enter the user code of the person to whom you want to transfer money in the respective field.

Rejected.full: Your transfer request has been rejected, possibly due to insufficient balance in your transfer currency.

security-guidline.one: Dear users, please pay attention to the following security tips:

security-guidline.two: 1.The ways to communicate with Xbarat are as follows:

security-guidline.four: Direct messages via the Xbarat page

security-guidline.six: WhatsApp number provided to you by Xbarat support.

security-guidline.eight: Xbarat support will only contact you through the channels mentioned above, and any interaction outside of these specified communication methods is not associated with Xbarat, and the user will be solely responsible for any harmful consequences.

security-guidline.nine: 2.All of your transactions with Xbarat will only take place through the website. No operations (deposit, transfer, withdrawal, or exchange) are possible outside of the site.

security-guidline.ten: 3.To prevent any misuse of your account in Xbarat, please refrain from sharing or providing your registered information, which includes the following:

security-guidline.twelve: National ID number (the ID number uploaded on the site)

security-guidline.fifteen: Finally, users who connect to Xbarat support outside of the mentioned communication channels or share their uploaded documents with others will be at risk of fraud, and any consequences will be the sole responsibility of the user.

securityGuidlineAgreement: I Have Read The Terms Above,Hence Xbarat Will not Be Responsible for Further Mistakes.

ContextPendingRequestTips.two: Please write the transaction code in the PayPal description; after submiting take a screenshot and upload the image to confirm your deposit requres.

ContextPendingRequestTips.five: To deposit Tether, make sure to use the Bep20 network and at the end, provide the transaction hash to the support team along with the receipt.

ContextPendingRequestTips.eight: To deposit Dirham, use the bank Al-Maria's card number. If you are outside of Al-Maria bank, please use the IBAN.
